description:
A shirt to make you rethink your summer silhouette. The loose Sano Shot Sleeve has a retro Scandi style and is cut from a breathable hemp blend, making it perfect for warm days and cool summer nights.Hemp and recycled polyester for softness and fluid movement.UPF 30+ rating blocks more than 95% of harsh UV.Roomy design and gathering detail on the back give the top a breezy coolness.Dropped hem line plays well with a French tuck.Regular fit offers no surprises, just stylish comfort.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: MEC Sano Short Sleeve Shirt - Women's
